definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: lift, carry, take (NH = BH; Ph. [[נשא]] id. Lzb:326; As. našû, id.  Dl:HWB 484; BAram. [[נְשָׂא]] (rare); Syr. in ma0sa0to0 scales; Palm. [[נסא]], [[נשא]]

definitions.title: n.pr.
definitions.body: Lzb:326 Cook:81, 83 (cp. [[נשׁא]] forget); Ar. na4a0’a intrans. rise, be high, etc.; Sab. in n.pr., e.g. CIS:iv. 5. 1; also [[נשא]] vb. Hal:Rev. Sem. iv (1896), 69 Min. [[נשא]] take, Hom:Südar. Chrest. 128; Eth. na40a: suscipere, tollere Di:635, so O Eth., DHM:Epigr. Denkm. aus Abess. (1894), 52);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: :599 Pf. ´[[נ]] Ge 13:6 +; 2 ms. [[נׇשָׂאתָ]] 1Ki 2:26 +, [[נֶשָׂאתָה]] Nu 14:19, sf. [[נְשָׂאתַ֫נִי]] Ps 102:11; 2 fs. sf. [[נְשָׂׂאתִים]] Ez Eze 16:58; 3 pl. [[נָֽשְׂאוּ]] 2Sa 18:28 +, [[נׇשׂוּא]] Ps 139:20, [[וְנׇשׂוּ]] consec. Ez Eze 39:26, sf. [[נְשָׂאוּם]] 2Ch 12:11, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִשָּׂא]] Ge 32:21 +, [[וַיִּשָּׂא]] Ge 13:10 +, sf. [[יִשָּׂאֵהוּ]] De 32:11+; 3 mpl. [[יִשְׂאוּ]] Ho 4:8 +, [[יִשָָּׂאוּ]] Hb Hab 2:6 +, [[וַיִּשְׂאוּ]] Ju Jdg 2:4 +; sf. [[יִשָּׂאֻנוּ]] Is 64:5; 3 fpl. [[תִּשֶּׂ֫נׇה]] Je 9:17, [[וַתִּשֶּׂ֫אנׇה]] Ru 1:9, [[וַתִּשֶּׂ֫נׇה]] Zec 5:9, Ru 1:14; 2 fpl. [[תִּשֶּׂ֫אינׇה]] Ez Eze 23:49, etc.; Imv. ms. [[שָׂא]] Ge 13:14 +, [[נְשָׂא]] Ps 10:12, [[נְסָה]] Ps 4:7; sf. [[שָׂאֵהוּ]] Nu 11:12, 2Ki 4:19; fs. [[שְׂאִי]] Ge 21:18 +, etc.; Inf. abs. [[נׇשׂוֹא]] Je 10:5, [[נׇשׂא]] Ho 1:6 + 2 t.; cstr. [[נְשׂא]] Is 1:14 2 t., [[שׂוֹא]] Ps 89:10, (rd. perh. [[שְׁאוֹן]] roar Ri Bi Che, cf. Hi [[שׁוֹא]]), usu. [[שְׂאֵת]] Ge 4:7 +; sf. [[נׇשְׂאִי]] Ps 28:2, [[שְׂאֵתִי]] Je 15:15, Ps 89:51, etc.; Aramaizing Inf. [[לְמַשְׂאוֹת]] Ez Eze 17:9 (si vera l.; Co Berthol [[לְיוֹם שְׂאֵת]]); Pt. act. [[נשֵׁׂא]] Ex 34:7 +, f. [[נשְׁׂאֵת]] 1Ki 10:22, [[נשֵׁׂאת]] Es 2:15, etc.; pass. cstr. [[נְשׂוּא]] Is 3:3 +, [[נְשׂוּי]] Ps 32:1, etc.;—
lift, lift up:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: lit., c. acc. pers. vel rei; the food lifts ark Ge 7:17 (J), ´[[י]] lifts standard ([[נֵס]]) Is 5:26, Is 11:12 + (oft. sq. [[ל]] pers.), rod Is 10:26, c. [[עַל]] against v:Is 10:24, [[חֶרֶב אֶל־]] ´[[נ]] Mic 4:3 = Is 2:4, etc.;—esp. lift in order to hold, carry away, etc. Ge 21:18 (E), Ju Jdg 9:48, Am 6:10, 2Sa 2:32, 2Sa 4:4, 1Ki 13:29, 2Ki 9:25, 2Ki 9:26, Ez Eze 3:12, Eze 3:14, Eze 8:3, Eze 11:24 +; lift up wings to fly Ez Eze 10:16, Eze 10:19, Eze 11:22; † [[רַגְלָיו וַיֵּלֶח]] ´[[נ]] Ge 29:1 he lifted up his feet and went; lift up, upon ([[על]]) Ge 31:17, Ge 42:26 (both E), fig. Job 31:36; [[בְּמאׁזְנַיִם]] ´[[נ]] Job 6:2 put a thing into scale; [[בוֹ אָלָה]] ´[[נ]] put on him (require of him) an oath 1Ki 8:31 = 2Ch 6:22, so van d. H., LXX; correct MT [[נׇשָׁא]] (Baer Ginsb), but sense hardly possible; [[אֶשָּׂא בְשָׂרִי בְשִׁנׇּ֑י]] Job 13:14 I will take up my flesh in my teeth (fig. for hazarding life).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: in many phr., lit. and fig., e.g.: (1) lift up hand; against ([[ב]]) 2Sa 18:28, 2Sa 20:21, c. [[לְ]] Ps 106:26; [[אֶל־]] (as signal) Is 49:22; abs., in display of power Ps 10:l2; freq. in oath (esp. Ez P; of ´[[י]] usu. sq. inf., oft. + [[ל]] pers.) Ex 6:8, Nu 14:30 (both P), Ez Eze 20:5, Eze 20:5, Eze 20:6, Eze 20:15, Eze 20:23, Eze 20:28, Eze 20:42, Eze 36:7, Eze 44:12, Eze 47:14, Ne 9:15, + [[אֶל־שָׁמַיִם]] De 32:40 lift hand to heaven; in prayer (c. [[אֶל־]]) Ps 28:2, La 2:19, so ([[בְּשִׁמְְ]]) Ps 63:5, abs. Ps 134:2, and, remarkably, [[אֶל־מִחְוֹתֶיְ]] Ps 119:48; also fig. of the deep ([[תְּהוֹם]]) Hb Hab 3:10; in blessing Le 9:22 (P; c. [[אֶל]]). (2) lift up one's head = shew boldness, independence Ju Jdg 8:28, Zec 2:4, Job 10:15, Ps 83:3; of another = restore to honour Ge 40:13, Ge 40:20 (E), but lift thy head from off thee ([[מֵעָלֶיְ]]), v:Ge 40:19, by word-play;—+ [[מִבֵּית כֶּלֶא]] 2Ki 25:27 = Je 52:31; fig. of gates, lift up your heads Ps 24:7, Ps 24:9. (3) lift up one's face, countenance ([[פָּנִים]]), lit., 2Ki 9:32 ([[אֶל־]]); sign of good conscience 2Sa 2:22 ([[אֶל־]]), abs. Job 11:15; of ´[[י]], sign of favour, [[פָּנֶי ְאֶל־]] ´[[נ]] Nu 6:26 (P; form of benediction); cf. [[אוֹר]] ´[[נ]] [[פָּנֶי ְעַל־]] Ps 4:7; esp. lift up face of another (orig. prob. of one prostrate in humility; opp. [[הֵשִׁיב]] [[פָּנִים]] repel), in various shades of mng.: = grant a request Ge 19:21 (J; + [[לַדָּבָר הַזֶּה]]), 1Sa 25:35, Job 42:8, Job 42:9; = be gracious to, Ge 32:21 (E), Mal 1:8, Mal 1:9; hence phr. [[נְשׂוּא פָנִים]] graciously received, held in honour † 2Ki 5:1 (of Naaman), and, as subst., honourable, eminent one Is 3:3, Is 9:14 (but del. as gloss), Job 22:8 †; = shew consideration for De 28:50, La 4:16; also in bad sense = be unduly influenced by Job 32:21, and, specif., = shew partiality (towards) De 10:17 (denied of ´[[י]]), Le 19:15 (H), Mal Mal 2:9 ([[בַּתּוֹרָה]]), Job 13:8, Job 13:10, Job 34:19, Pr 18:5, Ps 82:2 (syn. ´[[הִכִּיר פ]]); even [[פְּנֵי כָל־כּׂפֶר]] ´[[נ]] Pr 6:35 i.e. regard any bribe. (4) lift up eyes, on high 2Ki 19:22 = Is 37:23, cf. Ps 121:1 ([[אֶל־]]); [[לַשָּׁמַיִם]] Is 51:6 (‖[[הִבִּיט אֶל־]]); sq. [[ה]] loc. De 3:27, De 4:19 cf. Ez Eze 8:5, Eze 8:5; toward ([[אֶל־]]) idols Ez Eze 18:6, Eze 18:12, Eze 18:15, Eze 33:25, cf. Eze 23:27; toward ([[אֶל־]]) ´[[י]] Ps 123:1 (these with implied worship); [[עֵינֶיהָ אֶל־]] ´[[נ]] Ge 39:7 i.e. she gazed at him with desire; usu. + vb. of seeing (35 t.) Ge 13:10, Ge 13:14, Ge 18:2 + (Hex only JE), Is 40:26 (+ [[מָרוֹם]]), Is 49:18, Is 60:4 (both + [[סָבִיב]]), Je 3:2 (+ [[עַל־]]). (5) lift up voice ([[קוֹל]]), give (loud) utterance Is 52:8, of floods Ps 93:3, + and weep Ge 21:16 (E) Ge 27:38, Ge 29:11 (both J), Ju Jdg 2:4, + [[וַתִּשָּׂא וַיִּתְּנוּ אֶת־קוֹלָם וַיִּבִכוּ]] Nu 14:1 (P), + 9 t.; + [[יׇרׂ֫נוּ]] Is 24:14; + [[קָרָא]] Ju Jdg 9:7; [[קוֹל]] om. Is 3:7, Is 42:2, v:Is 42:11 (‖[[יׇרׂ֫נוּ]]); also (6) lift up (+ vb. of saying, usu. [[אָמַר]]), oft. of formal and solemn utterance, [[מָשָׁל]] ´[[נ]] Nu 23:7, Nu 23:18, Nu 24:3, Nu 24:15, Nu 24:20, Nu 24:21, Nu 24:23, Job 27:1, Job 29:1 + [[עַל]] Mic 2:4, Hb Hab 2:6, Is 14:4; [[ונשׂא־בוֹ אָלָה]] 1Ki 8:31 and he shall lift up against him an oath = 2Ch 6:22 (MT [[וְנׇשָׁא]] v. Baer Ginsb, but sense difficult; read rather [[וְנׇשָׂא]]); [[עָלָיו הַמַּשָּׂא הַזֶּה]] ´[[נ]] ´[[י]] 2Ki 9:25; [[קִינׇה]] ´[[נ]], + [[עַל־]] Je 7:29, Ez Eze 26:17, Eze 27:2, Eze 28:12, Eze 32:2, + [[אֶל־]] Eze 19:1, Eze 27:32; lift up word Am 5:1 ([[על]], + [[קִינׇה]]); weeping Je 9:9 ([[עַל־]]); lamentation ([[נְהִי]]) v:Je 9:17 ([[עַל־]]), reproach Ps 15:3 ([[עַל־]]). (7) lift up, take up = utter: name of ´[[י]], [[לַשָּׁוְא]] Ex 20:7, Ex 20:7 = De 5:11, De 5:11 (Decalogue); cf. Ps 139:20 (read prob. [[שְׁמְֶָ]] Bö Ol Che Kau); [[בַּל־אֶשָּׂא שְׁמוֹתָם עַל־שְׂפָתָָי]] Ps 16:4; [[בְּרִיתִי עֲלֵי־פִיְ]] ´[[נ]] Ps 50:16; prob. also [[שֵׁמַע שָׁוְא]] ´[[נ]] Ex 23:1 (E). (8) lift up prayer in behalf of ([[בְּעַד]]) † 2Ki 19:4 = Is 37:4, Je 7:16, Je 11:14. (9) lift up soul ([[נֶפֶשׁ]]), i.e. direct the desire ([[נֶפֶשׁ]]

definitions.title: 1 d
definitions.body: ) towards ([[אל]]) a thing, De 24:15, Pr 19:18, [[אֶל־עָוֹן]] Ho 4:8, [[לַשָּׁוְא]] Ps 24:4 (cf.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: and II. [[מַשָּׂא]]
); ´[[אֶל־י]] Ps 25:1, Ps 86:4, Ps 143:8, so the heart La 3:41. (10) take up (incur) sin, iniquity, (only HP) † Ex 28:43, Nu 18:22, c. [[עַל]] for Le 19:17, Le 22:9, Nu 18:32 (cf. also

definitions.title: 2 b
definitions.body: ). (11) of heart lifting one up, (inciting), Ex 35:21, Ex 35:26, Ex 36:2 (all P); of presumption 2Ki 14:10 = 2Ch 25:19.—MT appar. requires intrans. or reflex. meaning, lift oneself up, in foll., text dub. in all: Ho 13:1 rd. perh. [[נׇשִׂיא]] Oort We cf. Now; Na 1:5 Now (after Bi) [[וַתֵּשָׁא]] (rd. [[וַתֵּ֫שֶׁא]]? √ [[שׁאה]]); Ps 89:10 rd. [[שְׁאוֹן]] Bi Ri Che; Hb Hab 1:3 [[יִשָּׂא]] queried by We Gr Buhl al., cf. Gunkel:Schöpfung 33.
Bear, carry:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: lit., a load or burden (usu. acc.) Ge 37:25, Ge 44:1 (both J), Ge 45:23, Ge 45:23 (E), 1Sa 10:3, 1Sa 10:3, 1Sa 10:3, Je 10:5, Je 17:21, Je 17:27 + very oft.; [[נׁשֵׂא כֵלִים]] armour-bearer Ju Jdg 9:54, 1Sa 14:1 + oft. S; bearing weapons 1Ch 5:18, 1Ch 12:24, 2Ch 14:7, 2Ch 14:7; La 3:27 ([[עׂל]] ´[[נ]] fig.), Is 1:14 (fig., cf.

definitions.title: d
definitions.body: infr.); a 1oud of care, responsibility De 1:9, De 1:12; share a burden with [[אֶת־]] ´[[נ]] Ex 18:22 (E; no acc.); with ´[[ב]], [[יִשָּׂא]] [[בְשִׁיחִי מִשְׁכָּבִי]] Job 7:13 my bed shall carry at (help carry) my grief, Nu 11:17; take up and carry (idolatrous images) Am 5:26, Is 46:7; bear ephod, 1Sa 2:28, 1Sa 14:3 + v:1Sa 14:18 (LXX.), 1Sa 22:18 (v. Dr in Hastings:Dict. 726); in triumph Is 8:4.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: esp. bear guilt, or punishment Ge 4:13 (J, [[עֲוֹנִי]]), oft. Ez HP: † [[עָוֹן]] ´[[נ]] Le 5:1, Le 5:17, Le 7:18, Nu 5:31, Nu 14:34, cf. Nu 15:31 (all P), Le 17:16, Le 19:8, Le 20:17, Le 20:19 (H) Ez Eze 14:10, Eze 44:12 (cf.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: support, sustain, on ([[על]]) wings Ex 19:4, De 32:11, Ps 91:12 (all fig.); land could not support them Ge 13:6 (J), Ge 36:7 (P).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: endure Je 15:15, Je 31:19, Ez Eze 36:6, Job 34:31, Ps 55:13, Ps 69:8, Ps 88:16, Pr 18:14, Pr 30:21; suffer, bear with, permit Job 21:3.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: bear, carry, [[וַיִּשָּׂא מֵאֵת פָּנׇיו אֲלֵהֶם]] Ge 43:34 (J) and they (indef.) carried portions from his presence unto them; carry gifts as tribute 2Sa 8:2, 2Sa 8:6; later, bring an offering Ps 96:8 = 1Ch 16:29, Ez Eze 20:31 (LXX Co [[בראשׁית]]; Toy foll. MT).

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: carry = contain, hold: bath to hold 1/10 homer Ez Eze 45:11.

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: bear fruit, of tree Hag 2:19, Joe 2:22, fig. Ez Eze 36:8; boughs Eze 17:23 (in fig.); produce, yield, of mountains Job 40:20, Ps 72:3 (both c. [[לְ]] for).
Take, take away:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: lit. c. [[מִן]] 1Sa 17:34, Nu 16:15 (unjustly).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: take away, carry off, Ju Jdg 21:23, 1Ki 15:22 = 2Ch 16:6, 1Ki 18:12, La 5:13, Mic 2:2, Je 49:29 ([[ל]] pers.), Is 40:24, Is 41:16 +; take away head ([[מֵעַל]] pers.) Ge 40:19 (v. supr.); sweep away = destroy Job 32:22 (cf.

definitions.title: Niph. 4
definitions.body: ); life 2Sa 14:14.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: take away, guilt, iniquity, transgression, etc., i.e. forgive, c. acc. Ge 50:17 (E), Ex 32:32 (E), Ex 10:17, Ex 34:7 (J), Nu 14:18 (JE), 1Sa 15:25, Ho 14:3, Job 7:21 (‖[[הֶעֱכִיר עָוֹן]]), Ps 32:5; + [[ל]] pers. Mic 7:18; [[ל]] pers., acc. om., Ge 18:20 (J), Nu 14:19 (JE; ‖[[סלח עָוֹן]]), Ho 1:6, Is 2:9 (prob. gloss.), Ps 99:8; c. [[ל]] of sin Ge 50:17, Ex 23:21 (both E), 1Sa 25:28, Ps 25:18; [[נְשֻׂא עָוֹן]] Is 33:24; [[נְשׂוּי־]] [[פֶּשַׁע]] Ps 32:1. [In this sense ´[[נ]] used in E; [[סלח]] in D P; both in J; ´[[נ]] also in early proph., S. and Jb, and in earlier and latest PsalmPsalm; not in Je K Is:Is 2 La Chr Dn, which use [[סלח]]; v. Br:Hex. 155.]

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: take as wife (usu. c. [[לְ]] for), late: Ezr 9:2, Ezr 9:12, Ezr 10:44, Ne 13:25, 2Ch 11:21, 2Ch 13:21, 2Ch 24:3, Ru 1:4.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: take an enumeration, usu. c. [[ראׁשׁ]] sum Ex 30:12, Nu 1:2, Nu 1:49, Nu 4:2, Nu 4:22, Nu 26:2, Nu 32:26, 32:49 (all P); c. [[מִסְפָּר]] Nu 3:40, 1Ch 27:23.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: take and carry away, receive, De 33:3, 1Ki 5:23, Ps 24:5; hence, obtain favour ([[חֶסֶד]], [[חֵן]]) Es 2:9, Es 2:17 (both + [[לִפְנֵי]]), Es 5:2 (+ [[בְּעֵינׇיו]]).—[[לְמַשְׂאוֹת אוֹתָהּ מִשָּׁרָשֶׁיהָ]] Ez Eze 17:9 (Co Berthol ´[[לְיוֹם שְׂאֵת וגו]]) is usu. rendered plucking it up (tearing it away) by the roots, but dub.; ´[[נ]] not elsewhere in this sense.
lift up = exalt, kingdom 2Sa 5:12 (‖

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: 1Ch 14:2), pers. Es 5:11 ([[עַל]]), cf. Es 3:1; = support, aid, assist Ezr 8:36, Es 9:3; c. [[ב]] aid with trees (supply with) 1Ki 9:11, so Ezr 1:4.
carry, bear continuously Is 63:9, Ps 28:9.
take, take away 2Sa 19:43 ([[ל]] for; but v.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִתְנַשָָּׂא]] Nu 23:24; 3 fs. [[תִּנַּשֵּׂא]] Nu 24:7; 2 ms. [[תִּתְנַשֵּׂא]] Ez Eze 29:15; 3 mpl. [[יִנַּשְּׂאוּ]] Da 11:14; 2 mpl. [[תִּתְנַשְּׂאוּ]] Nu 16:3; Inf. [[הִתְנַשֵּׂא]] Ez Eze 17:14, Pr 30:32; Pt. [[מִתְנַשֵּׂא]] 1Ki 1:5, 1Ch 29:11; —lift oneself up, like a lion Nu 23:24 (JE); pt. he who exalts himself 1Ch 29:11 (+ [[לְכׂל לְראׁשׁ]]) as human ruler (Kau), > (sc. [[אַתָּה]]) of ´[[י]] as ruler; Ew:§ 160 e Ke Be as subst. [inf. of Aram. form], the exaltation; of a kingdom Nu 24:7 (JE), cf. Ez Eze 17:14; in arrogance 1Ki 1:5, Nu 16:3 (P; c. [[עַל־]]), Ez Eze 29:15 (c. [[עַל]]), Pr 30:32, Da 11:14. †

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. consec.
cause one to bear iniquity (2 acc.) [[וְהִשִּׂ֫יאוּ]] Le 22:16.
appar. cause to bring, have brought, [[וְהִשִּׂיאוּ]] 2Sa 17:13 (c. acc. rei + [[אֶל]] loc.), but very dub.; Ki Kit Bu [[וְיָשִׂימוּ]] HPS [[וְהֵבִיאוּ]]; > We [[הֵשִׂימוּ]].
